name: Dreamers Tower
description:
My submission to the 2021 Boss Rush Game Jam!

A platformer boss rush with 5 unique bosses. It's not overly challenging but hopefully, you find it enjoyable :D

---

All art, music and code is my own and it was made in Game Maker Studio 2 in the allocated time.

Im sorry, but due to the licensing I have for GMS2 I can only make a Windows exe... ;-;
